trans-unit.source: Defines points of interest in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance about which a tracking service should be notified.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 추적 서비스가 알림을 받아야 하는 루트 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로에 관심 지점을 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] During its run time, a workflow instance emits tracking events to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]런타임 중 워크플로 인스턴스는 런타임 추적 인프라에 추적 이벤트를 내보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses a TrackingProfile to filter these tracking events and returns tracking records based on this filtering to a tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라는 TrackingProfile를 사용 하 여 이러한 추적 이벤트를 필터링 하 고 추적 서비스에이 필터링 기준으로 추적 레코드를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: There are three kinds of tracking events that can be filtered: activity status events, workflow status events, and user events.
trans-unit.target: 추적 이벤트를 필터링 할 수 있는 세 종류: 활동 상태 이벤트, 워크플로 상태 이벤트 및 사용자 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> objects to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A> property to match specific activity status events; <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> objects to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> property to match specific workflow status events; and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> objects to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A> property to match specific user events.
trans-unit.target: 특정 활동 상태 이벤트와 일치 하도록 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>속성에 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>개체를 추가할 수 있습니다. <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>개체는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A>특정 워크플로 상태 이벤트와 일치 하도록 속성 및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>개체를 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A>속성을 특정 사용자 이벤트와 일치 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a track point is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure returns the data associated with the tracking event to the tracking service over the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with that service.
trans-unit.target: 추적 지점이 일치할 때 런타임 추적 인프라를 통해 추적 서비스에 추적 이벤트와 연결 된 데이터를 반환 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>해당 서비스와 관련 된.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>

trans-unit.source: The data is returned in either an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>, or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> depending on the type of track point that was matched.
trans-unit.target: 데이터에 반환 됩니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>, 즉 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>, 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>일치 된 추적 지점 유형에 따라.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: A tracking service implements the methods in the abstract <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class to provide the functionality for the runtime tracking infrastructure to request a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with the service, and a TrackingProfile associated with a particular workflow instance or with a particular workflow type.
trans-unit.target: 추상 메서드를 구현 하는 추적 서비스 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>런타임 추적 인프라를 요청에 대 한 기능을 제공 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>TrackingProfile 관련 된 특정 워크플로 인스턴스에 특정 워크플로 유형 및 서비스와 관련 된.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>

trans-unit.source: A tracking service must also implement the abstract <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> class to provide the channel over which the runtime tracking infrastructure can send tracking records.
trans-unit.target: 추적 서비스는 추상 구현 해야 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>추적 레코드를 런타임 추적 인프라가 보낼 수 있는 채널을 제공 하기 위해 클래스.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>

trans-unit.source: When the tracking service returns a tracking profile object to the runtime, the workflow starts to execute, and the tracking profile is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 추적 서비스는 추적 프로필을 반환 하는 경우 런타임에 대해, 개체를 실행 하려면 다시 시작 및 추적 프로필이 serialize 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the serialization of the tracking profile fails, an exception is raised to the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 추적 프로필의 serialization에 실패 하면 워크플로 인스턴스에 예외가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the exception is not handled, the workflow instance is terminated.
trans-unit.target: 예외 처리 되지 않은 경우 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The tracking profile can be validated before passing it to the runtime using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 런타임에 전달 하기 전에 추적 프로필 유효성을 검사할 수는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>속성.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A TrackingProfile can be serialized to XML by using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>, which formats the XML according to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>.
trans-unit.target: TrackingProfile에 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> 에 따라 XML 형식을 지정 하는,</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> 사용 하 여 XML로 serialize 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This provides a convenient format for profile storage and for authoring a profile in a non-programmatic manner.
trans-unit.target: 이 프로필 저장소에 대 한 및 비 프로그래밍 방식의 프로필 작성에 대 한 편리한 형식을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the SQL Tracking Service stores serialized versions of its tracking profiles, as will any tracking service you create based on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> class.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 SQL 추적 서비스를 중지 serialize 버전 추적 프로필의 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>클래스</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> 를 기반으로 만드는 모든 추적 서비스는

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes an empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 생성자는 빈을 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> 를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can add track points to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> to configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 추적점을 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> 를 구성 하</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> 고</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of activity track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter activity status events.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라가 활동 상태 이벤트를 필터링 하는 데 사용 하는 활동 추적 지점 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance emits activity status events to the runtime tracking infrastructure whenever the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> of an activity instance changes.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스는 활동 상태 이벤트를 런타임 추적 인프라로 내보냅니다 때마다는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>활동 인스턴스 변경.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the ActivityTrackPoints property to filter these activity status events to determine when to send an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라에서 ActivityTrackPoints 속성을 사용 하 여 보낼 시기를 결정 하려면 이러한 활동 상태 이벤트를 필터링 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>를 추적 서비스로.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: You can add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> to the ActivityTrackPoints property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want the runtime infrastructure to send an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>런타임 인프라 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> 보내도록 할 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로에 관심 지점을 지정할 ActivityTrackPoints 속성에</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines a set of match parameters that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match an activity status event for which it should send an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>워크플로 인스턴스에 물리적 지점을 정의 실제로 않습니다 하지만 대신 런타임 추적 인프라는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> 를 보내야 하는 활동 상태 이벤트와 일치 하도록 하 여 사용할 수 있는 일치 매개 변수 집합을 정의 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the same <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 동일한 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>워크플로 인스턴스 수명 동안 여러 번 일치할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> can also specify data to be extracted from the workflow instance and returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>워크플로 인스턴스에서 추출할 데이터를 지정할 수도 및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> 반환</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPointCollection"></xref> that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send an <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPointCollection"> </xref> 런타임 추적 인프라가 보내야 하는 워크플로 인스턴스의 지점을 지정 하는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"> </xref> 를 추적 서비스로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of user track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter user events.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 이벤트를 필터링 하는 런타임 추적 인프라에서 사용 하는 사용자 추적 지점 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A workflow designer or an activity designer can use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to instrument a workflow or an activity to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure at specific points during the execution of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 활동 디자이너나 워크플로 디자이너 צ ְ ײ <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>워크플로 나 활동을 런타임 인프라 특정 지점에서 워크플로 실행 하는 동안 추적 데이터를 내보낼을 계측할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Such an occurrence is called a user event and the data emitted is called user data.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 발생 사용자 이벤트 라고 합니다. 하 고 내보낸 데이터에는 사용자 데이터 라고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the UserTrackPoints property to filter user events to determine when to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라가 사용자 이벤트를 필터링 하려면 UserTrackPoints 속성을 사용 하 여 보낼 시기를 결정 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>를 추적 서비스로.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: You can add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> to the UserTrackPoints property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> sent.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>검색할 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로에 관심 지점을 지정할 UserTrackPoints 속성에는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>전송.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines a set of match parameters that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match user events.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>대신 런타임 추적 인프라가 사용자 이벤트와 일치 하도록 사용할 수 있는 일치 매개 변수 집합을 정의 하지만 실제로 워크플로 인스턴스에 물리적 지점을 정의 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the same <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 동일한 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>워크플로 인스턴스 수명 동안 여러 번 일치할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure always returns the user data associated with a matched <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>, but a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> can also specify data to be extracted from the workflow instance and returned in the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라가 일치와 관련 된 사용자 데이터를 항상 반환 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>에 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>, 하지만 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>워크플로 인스턴스에서 추출 하 고 추적 레코드에 반환 된 데이터를 지정할 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPointCollection"></xref> that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPointCollection"> </xref> 런타임 추적 인프라가 보내야 하는 워크플로 인스턴스의 지점을 지정 하는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"> </xref> 를 추적 서비스로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of the tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: 추적 프로필의 버전을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Because of the semantics of profile caching in the workflow runtime engine, if you change the contents of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> you must update Version.
trans-unit.target: 내용을 변경 하는 경우 워크플로 런타임 엔진에서 캐시 프로필의 의미 체계 때문에 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>버전을 업데이트 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: If you do not, your updated <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> may not be loaded by the workflow runtime engine, even if it is returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.TryReloadProfile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or sent in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> associated with a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event.
trans-unit.target: 업데이트 한 후, 그렇지 않은 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>에 대 한 호출에서 반환 하는 경우에 워크플로 런타임 엔진에 의해 로드 되지 않을 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.TryReloadProfile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, 또는에 보낸는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>연관는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>이벤트.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.TryReloadProfile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to ensure that the updated <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> is loaded by the workflow runtime engine, you should change the Version for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 업데이트 되도록 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>로드 되는 워크플로 런타임 엔진 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> 에 대 한 버전을 변경 해야</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: You can then explicitly call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.ReloadTrackingProfiles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on any appropriate workflow instances, or, depending on your implementation, you can rely on the tracking service to inform the workflow runtime engine of the change.
trans-unit.target: 명시적으로 호출한 다음 수 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.ReloadTrackingProfiles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>적절 한 워크플로 인스턴스, 또는 구현 방식에 따라, 변경의 워크플로 런타임 엔진에 알리기 위해 추적 서비스에 의존할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.ReloadTrackingProfiles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Version> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Version> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.</xref:System.Version>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of workflow track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 상태 이벤트를 필터링 하는 런타임 추적 인프라에서 사용 하는 워크플로 추적 지점 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance emits workflow status events to the runtime tracking infrastructure whenever a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> occurs indicating that the status of a workflow instance has changed.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스는 워크플로 상태 이벤트를 런타임 추적 인프라로 내보냅니다 때마다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>워크플로 인스턴스의 상태가 변경 되었음을 나타내는 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the WorkflowTrackPoints property to filter these workflow status events to determine when to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라에서 WorkflowTrackPoints 속성을 사용 하 여 보낼 시기를 결정 하려면 이러한 워크플로 상태 이벤트를 필터링 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>를 추적 서비스로.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: You can add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> to the WorkflowTrackPoints property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> sent.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>검색할 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로에 관심 지점을 지정할 WorkflowTrackPoints 속성에는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>전송.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>실제로 워크플로 인스턴스에 물리적 지점을 정의 하지 않습니다 하지만 하나 이상 정의 하는 대신 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>워크플로 상태 이벤트와 일치 하도록 런타임 추적 인프라에서 사용할 수 있는 값입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the same <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 동일한 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>워크플로 인스턴스 수명 동안 여러 번 일치할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> can also specify any annotations to be returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> 에 반환 될 주석을 지정할 수도 있습니다</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPointCollection"></xref> that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"></xref> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPointCollection"> </xref> 런타임 추적 인프라가 보내야 하는 워크플로 인스턴스의 지점을 지정 하는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"> </xref> 를 추적 서비스로 합니다.
